column1: What is the first step to update the software packages?
column2: The first step is to open the terminal and run the 'sudo dnf upgrade' command.

column1: How can a user copy the code provided in the document?
column2: The user can copy the code using the little clipboard icon to the right of the code.

column1: What should be set in the Displays menu to enable fractional scaling on Wayland?
column2: The 'Scale' should be set to the user's preference in the Displays menu.

column1: Where can a user enable 'tap-to-click' on the touchpad?
column2: A user can enable 'tap-to-click' on the touchpad in the Mouse and Touchpad settings.
